description: This file defines an Angular standalone component called HeaderComponent, which includes logic for user authentication, searching, and logout functionality. It imports Angular core features, services, and modules to create an interactive header UI component.

classes.name: HeaderComponent
classes.description: An Angular component managing header-related UI, including user authentication status, search input, and logout functionality.

methods.name: onSearch
methods.description: Emits a search event with the current query string when the user initiates a search.

methods.name: logout
methods.description: Calls the auth service to log out the current user.
